entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is described as clapping and giving a speech.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: A professor at Hogwarts who is being addressed by Dumbledore. She is described as receiving praise from Dumbledore.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts who is observing the scene and noticing the reactions of others.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts who is described as having listened to Umbridge's speech and providing a low-key response.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts who is described as reacting to Hermione's comment with a glazed face.

relationships.description: Dumbledore praises Umbridge for her speech, calling it 'illuminating'.
Harry observes the staff clapping and following Dumbledore's lead.
Hermione responds to Umbridge's speech with a low-key comment, saying it was 'illuminating'.
Ron reacts to Hermione's comment by turning a glazed face upon her.
